message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can shake on it!
Meet me in the middle! Let's split it roughly 55/45
You're getting close, but I want a bit more!
Let's call a draw! 50/50 split, no hard feelings?
You're getting desperate, I can smell it!
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just getting strategic! Try to match this offer
You're bluffing, but I'm not falling for it!
Last chance, Bob! I'm willing to make a serious offer. Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
Final offer, Bob! I'm going all-in. Take it or walk away!
You've pushed me to the wall, but I'm not backing down! Take it or nothing!
